name: Scroogle Unity
description: This style is made for a better integration of Scroogle into Ubuntu unity and is based on the "painted black" style from whatrevolution. Of course, it can be used on windows too.
additional_info:
Here is how you can make Scroogle your default search engine in Firefox:
1: Type about:config into the urlbar and hit return
2: Promise that you'll be careful
3: type "keyword.url" into the search field.
4: Double click on the item and set it to: https://ssl.scroogle.org/cgi-bin/nbbwssl.cgi?Gw=
(Right click on the [*] and click on "copy link location"
5: Hit "ok".
